Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl

Class TimelineServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl.TimelineServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TimelineService
@Singleton public class TimelineServiceImpl extends Object implements TimelineService
The implementation of the timeline service, based on JDBC and ORM Lite to access the database.

  • Method Details

    • getTimelineConfiguration

      public EntityDoc[] getTimelineConfiguration()
      Description copied from interface: TimelineService
      Retrieves the whole configuration of the timeline. This defines a number of different bands, each with their hotpots. Each timeband is given a suggested scale (or time unit - decade, century, month day), etc. The hotspots also also given a unit.
      Specified by:
      getTimelineConfiguration in interface TimelineService
      Returns:
      a list of timebands with all the required details

      Given a reference to a passage, this looks up the relevant set of events
      Specified by:
      getEventsFromScripture in interface TimelineService
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference to look up
      Returns:
      a set of events and the date at which they occur

    • lookupEventsMatchingReference

      public EntityDoc[] lookupEventsMatchingReference(String reference)
      This method simply takes a reference, resolves it to the kjv versification, and then manages to output all events that match
      Specified by:
      lookupEventsMatchingReference in interface TimelineService
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference we are looking for
      Returns:
      the list of events matching the reference
